item.title: TikTok’s $1M Boost, Mailchimp’s AI Mojo & Meta’s Smart Bids—Small-Biz Analytics You’ll Love
item.description: Morning, scrappy marketers! Friday, June 20. Whether you’re running a side hustle from your kitchen table or a five-person shop on Main Street, this week’s analytics rollouts can stretch every marketing dollar. Let’s sip the intel. BIG BREW — Major News & Trends Mailchimp rolls out an AI tool-belt for tiny teams. Auto-segments, predictive send-times, and single-click reports now live in the SMB tier—meaning solo founders get enterprise-style insights without hiring a data scientist....
